title: ZONG 4G launches special yatra packages for Sikh pilgrims
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 18 (APP):As Sikh pilgrims from across the globe make their way to Pakistan for the sacred Sikh Yatra, Zong 4G, Pakistan’s leading telecom operator, is introduced a unique set of connectivity packages designed specifically to serve and connect the Sikh community on their holy journey.
Zong 4G’s Yatra Packages are thoughtfully designed to meet the needs of Sikh pilgrims, providing international connectivity.
According to news release the 30 Days Yatra Bundle offers Sikh pilgrims an all-in-one connectivity solution, featuring 200 international minutes for calls to the USA, Canada, UK, and India, a generous 200 GB of data, and unlimited local calls and SMS—all for Rs  3,000, including the SIM card.
For those seeking a shorter option, the 15 Days Yatra Bundle provides 50 international minutes to the same countries, 50 GB of data, and unlimited local calls and SMS for Rs. 1,700, including the SIM card.
Pilgrims can easily activate these special Yatra Packages by dialing 310 on their Zong 4G SIM, which will be readily available at Panja Sahib Gurdwara, Hassanabdal & Gurdwara Nankana Sahib.
By offering dedicated international calling minutes, extensive local connectivity, and data packages, ZONG 4G ensures that pilgrims have everything they need to stay connected during this special journey.
Huo Junli, CEO Zong 4G said “Zong 4G is honored to support the Sikh Yatra 2024 and welcome pilgrims with a unique offering that connects them not just locally, but globally. This initiative reflects our commitment to inclusivity and our dedication to connecting people beyond borders and beliefs.”
